entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of snow late this evening and overnight. Snow at times heavy beginning before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
